title: How to Draw a Lotus Flower

steps.title: Draw an oval with some dots inside it.
steps.content: Draw an oval with some dots inside it. This will be the seed pod.

steps.title: Draw the first layer of petals surrounding the seed pod.
steps.content: Draw the first layer of petals surrounding the seed pod.

steps.title: Draw the stamens around the seedpod.
steps.content: Draw the stamens around the seedpod.

steps.title: Draw the second layer of petals.
steps.content: Draw the second layer of petals.

steps.title: Add some details by drawing 2-3 curved lines on the tip and base of the petals.
steps.content: Add some details by drawing 2-3 curved lines on the tip and base of the petals.

steps.title: Draw some sepals at the base of the flower.
steps.content: Draw some sepals at the base of the flower . Add two long, curved lines for the stem.
